task_87.description: Place the yellow tissue on top of the green cup
task_87.initial_setup: The yellow tissue is folded and lying flat on the far right corner. The green cup is upright on the center of the table, 10 cm from the edge. A blue plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the left side.
task_87.final_state: The yellow tissue is flat and placed directly on top of the green cup. The blue cup is upright on the far left corner.
